item.title: Reading Notes 01232022
item.description: Reading: https://telegra.ph/一个哥大教授关于英文学术写作的一些建议-01-07 Notes: outlines, drafts with simple sentences, hard copy, and makes the words better subject verb object structure is a better way to start. Make an example once I have a point. remove extra words: moreover, furthermore, additionally, however. in other words, in short Don’t use transition. Let the logic of your outline carry it. Start directly. We don’t need “First and foremost” unless we have five points.
